name: Commie Killer 2069
description:
Your mission is to kill the communistic overlord that has taken over the United States at a forward operating base in the arctic, the year is 2069, and it's up to you. You are the Penalizer America's last hope to kill the Communist horde and their leader. Utilizing your bad ass plasma gun you will cut down all that would stand between you and the salvation of American freedom.

Features:
- One kick ass plasma gun.
- Kill all the Communists you desire.
- Save America, and the world too.........

Its up to you, patriot. Will serve or will you die?
